name: organization
description: The details about each organization delivering services. Each service should be linked to the organization responsible for its delivery. One organization may deliver many services.

id.name: id
id.title: Identifier
id.description: The identifier for the organization. Each organization must have a unique identifier.

name.name: name
name.title: Name
name.description: The official or public name of the organization.

description.name: description
description.title: Description
description.description: A free text description containing a brief summary about the organization. It can contain markup such as HTML or Markdown.
description.example: Example Org is a non-profit organization dedicated to providing services to qualified beneficiaries

email.name: email
email.title: Email
email.description: The contact e-mail address for the organization.

website.name: website
website.title: Website
website.description: The URL (website address) of the organization.

logo.name: logo
logo.title: Logo
logo.description: A URL to an image associated with the organization which can be presented alongside its name.
